name: Primite Dragon Nether Berzelius
effectText:
1 "Primite" monster + 1+ Normal Monsters
Gains 1000 ATK for each Normal Monster used for its Fusion Summon. Negate the activated effects of monsters your opponent controls, whose Levels/Ranks/Link Ratings are less than or equal to the number of Normal Monsters in your field and GY. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from your Deck in Defense Position.
